## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 20,000                                 |
| Rationale                         | To cover forecasted demand and account for potential variability, while minimizing excess inventory. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | 10,000 units less than the player's plan. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 3.8 days                                 |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 7.7 days                                 |
| Comments                          | The recommended order size allows for a comfortable buffer against demand fluctuations and potential stockouts, while maintaining a healthy inventory turnover rate. |
